top_stories.title: Qwen Team Releases Qwen3-Coder, a Large Agentic Coding Model with Open Tooling
top_stories.description: Qwen Team has announced Qwen3-Coder, a new family of agentic code models designed for long-context, multi-step programming tasks. The most capable variant, Qwen3-Coder-480B-A35B-Instruct, is a Mixture-of-Experts model with a total of 480 billion parameters and 35 billion active parameters per forward pass. By Robert Krzaczyński
top_stories.author: Robert Krzaczyński
top_stories.content: Qwen Team has announced Qwen3-Coder, a new family of agentic code models designed for long-context, multi-step programming tasks. The most capable variant, Qwen3-Coder-480B-A35B-Instruct, is a Mixture-of-Experts model with a total of 480 billion parameters and 35 billion active parameters per forward pass. By Robert Krzaczyński

top_stories.title: Kyruus builds a generative AI provider matching solution on AWS
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how Kyruus Health uses AWS services to build Guide. We show how Amazon Bedrock, a fully managed service that provides access to foundation models (FMs) from leading AI companies and Amazon through a single API, and Amazon OpenSearch Service, a managed search and analytics service, work together to understand everyday language about health concerns and connect members with the right providers.
top_stories.author: Zach Heath
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how Kyruus Health uses AWS services to build Guide. top_stories.title: AI and the 2025 SIEM landscape: A guide for SOC leaders
top_stories.description: Security teams often find themselves having to put out the immediate fires in front of them, but this comes at the expense of implementing a more methodical risk reduction strategy. Attack surfaces are expanding, and new risks emerge with new tech. Modern security operations center (SOC) teams are drowning in alerts, stretched thin by talent shortages, and racing to stay ahead of increasingly sophisticated adversaries.Security information and event management (SIEM) platforms are instrumental...
top_stories.author: Elastic Security Team

top_stories.title: Elastic Cloud Hosted — FedRAMP Moderate Authorized now supports C7gd instances
top_stories.description: We are excited to announce the support of C7gd instance types in the Elastic Cloud Hosted — FedRAMP Moderate Authorized offering, bringing meaningful price-performance benefits to US agencies, partners, and organizations.The new C7gd instances — powered by AWS Graviton3 (ARM) processors with local NVME-based SSDs — offer better performance and efficiency. C7gd instances provide up to 45% better real-time NVMe storage performance than comparable Graviton2-based instances. This makes C7gd an...

top_stories.title: Google's deepfake hunter sees what you can’t—even in videos without faces
top_stories.description: AI-generated videos are becoming dangerously convincing and UC Riverside researchers have teamed up with Google to fight back. Their new system, UNITE, can detect deepfakes even when faces aren't visible, going beyond traditional methods by scanning backgrounds, motion, and subtle cues. As fake content becomes easier to generate and harder to detect, this universal tool might become essential for newsrooms and social media platforms trying to safeguard the truth.

Their new system, UNITE, can detect deepfakes even when faces aren't visible, going beyond traditional methods by scanning backgrounds, motion, and subtle cues. As fake content becomes easier to generate and harder to detect, this universal tool might become essential for newsrooms and social media platforms trying to safeguard the truth.
